title: New Team
body:
Hello my name is Dan Nguyen or you can call me by my gamer tag Linx , I'm planning to make a team in LoL around this year and I'm in need of some passionate teammates. Our (we have a fighting team as well) team is called 7K, if anyone is interested in just playing with us, add me in LoL.
Gamer Tags
DrILinx D-r-I-L-i-n-x

Roles needed
Adc
Support
Mid
Top

replies.body: Wrong region. Try posting on the NA Boards.
